textBox.richText: Our drive up from Newport Beach ended in a funky little mall called The Grove. We spent the afternoon wandering around and somehow managed to find time for Felicity to buy shoes! We also managed to catch a session of Miami Vice. Today we are participating in a few touristy activities (Walk of Fame and Hollywood Sign) before we jump on the train and head to the Grand Canyon. Goodbye California ... hello 40 degree heat!
